title: Opinion: The new childhood vaccine guidelines have a paid leave problem
description: Norway, Denmark, and other countries with fewer childhood vaccines have another thing in common: paid parental leave.
content: Norway, Denmark, and other countries with fewer childhood vaccines have another thing in common: paid parental leave.
